Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_SAM>
All right, it's time to go squeeze some milk from
a cow!

<NAME_MOB_SAM>
Time for din-din, my pretties! Ho, ho, ho...

<NAME_MOB_SAM>
I may be old, but our lady ain't kicked me out
just yet. So I'm gonna keep on workin' hard for
her till she does!

<NAME_MOB_SAM>
Our lady is still just a kid. I wonder who's gonna
come along an' touch that cold heart o' hers...

<NAME_MOB_SAM>
Jus' between you and me, our lady has a
complex about her older sister.
<PAGE>
She was always compared to her when they
were growin' up. Real sad to see.

<NAME_MOB_SAM>
It's so painful for an old man like me to see our
lady acting like that...

<NAME_MOB_SAM>
These days, our lady's gotten real mellow. I
wonder who it is that went an' melted her
heart...

<NAME_MOB_SAM>
It's so nice to see our lady gone and changed
into a fine young woman...

<NAME_MOB_SAM>
Our lady was real kindly, once upon a time.
<PAGE>
An' now, it's like she's come back. Just the way
she was way back when...
